item.title: Contour Airlines to launch 2 new Caribbean island nonstops
item.description: Contour Airlines will link the Caribbean island of Dominica with Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands.

item.title: Spirit Airlines files for bankruptcy again. What you need to know
item.description: Spirit Airlines has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy after racking up losses in the five months since exiting its last bankruptcy.
